Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Plaza One Union Square features a two-story atrium lobby,key card security and a Federal Express drop box. It is located at the foothills of the Rocky Mountains with views of Downtown Denver and LePeep's restaurant on-site. It has access to Downtown Denver and the Federal Center as well as Union Boulevard corridor,restaurants and retail within walking distance and is close to hotels.
